Detailed Description

Main controller class for the Emeraldion Lodge.

EmeController implements all default filters and shared functionality that is specifically designed for the Emeraldion Lodge.

Definition at line 15 of file eme_controller.php.

EmeController::sanskrit_ambra (  )  [protected]

Filter method that converts response contents to Ambra Angiolini's "sanskrit".

This filter replaces all vowels with 'a', thus doing like Ambra Angiolini when singing during the Italian TV show "Non Ã¨ la Rai".

EmeController::load_part_contents ( $  filename  )  [protected]

Loads localized part contents from file.

Checks if a localized part file exists for the requested filename, otherwise calls the superclass implementation.

Parameters:
filename The name of the part file.
Returns:
The contents of the part file.

Reimplemented from BaseController.

Includes a localized version of the requested filename if possible.
